name: The Suspension Of Disbelief
description:
Credits:

Very huge thanks to people who encouraged us, supported us and tested the game, huge thanks to Brahim Mansouri, Dorbell Prod, jobA.

This game was made by Red1 & Adrex in one week for the Barji game jam (Barjam)

Controls:

Move: WASD or arrow keys.

Dash: Left Shift.

Shoot: Left Mouse Button.

Pause Game: escape.

Continue Dialogue: E.

Story:

This main charachter of the game is a normal human, being bullied at work, and having a hard life, he goes into a dream where he can shoot enemies (who are his co workers) and that's why they drop blood when you kill them, because they're originally humans. Knowing it's all fake, our main charachter still tries to have fun and get revenge on his co workers who bully him, and tries not to die so he doesn't wake up from his dream.
